column4: has anyone observed an error with firefox/folck (any gecko based browser) locking the system up when viewing png's?
I uninstalled all the plugins... disabled javascript...etc
locks your remote screen? that sure is strange. have you tried the mozilla ppl on there irc server?
that png looks normal, are the libpng binaries the same?
any other crashes with this machine?
possibly something has become corrupted, its my first course of action
save the ff dir, reinstall and in case diff
yes already moved it to to a diff
i guess the .user dirs are also the same?
then you would also have other crashes....and not necessarily reproducable with only the png...
right, you can't even ssh to the machine anymore, when she locks up?
